name: VeezStreamBot
description: Telegram Bot for streaming Video & Music through the Group Calls feature.

session.description: fill with the pyrogram String Session

database_url.description: fill with the mongodb url, You must create it first from cloud.mongodb.com (tutorial about how to make it, find it on @VeezSupportGroup)

sudoers_id.description: fill with the user id you want to be added into sudo member list (separate with spaces), or You can just fill this with your id

creator_id.description: fill with your own telegram id, this is needed because there's any feature that only can be used by bot owner

support_group.description: if you have group, then fill the group username here without @

support_channel.description: if you have channel, then fill the channel username here without @

creator_username.description: fill with your telegram account username without @

creator_name.description: fill with your telegram account nickname/name
